name: United States
details: The United States of America is a country primarily located in North America.

name: Canada
details: Canada is the second-largest country in the world by total area.

name: United Kingdom
details: The United Kingdom is a country located off the northwestern coast of mainland Europe.

name: Australia
details: Australia is a country and continent surrounded by the Indian and Pacific oceans.

name: India
details: India is a country in South Asia, known for its diverse culture and history.
